attributes.action: Give every house FREE wind and solar power equipment, to reduce green house gases
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: every house to have solar panels and wind turbines(home verion) free, this will help with the reduction of green house gas.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/BuildingRegs/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
